title: What if we could see how much an individual spell did in a game?
body:
It's probably been talked about before, but what if we could see how much overall damage your Q ability did in the game, how much damage the keystone 'Deathfire Touch' did in the game and so on...

It would be very interesting how much Deathfire Touch did in a game, and compare it with other Keystones, to really optimize your masteries. I understand every game is different, but it would give us somewhat of an idea of how strong a keystone is compared to another. Also, it could be used to compare damage of keystones in different phases of the game, i.e. early game, mid game and late game.

As I said, it's probably been talked about because this is present in a few addons for WoW and probably lots of other games. But giving an idea popularity never hurts, and perhaps if more people want this feature, it will be implemented.

I can't really see how this feature could be negative in anyway. Thanks for reading! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
